title: Report from a Natural Disaster Zone
description: A reporter is sent to cover a hurricane's aftermath. They must report on the damage and the human impact while dealing with difficult conditions.

tasks.description: Travel to the affected area and establish a safe base of operations.
Interview affected residents, first responders, and officials to gather personal stories and official information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers a mix of anecdotal and official information.

tasks.description: Capture photos and videos of the damage to provide visual context.
File stories back to the newsroom using a satellite phone or other backup communication method due to likely power outages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Stories are successfully filed despite infrastructure challenges.
